import React ,{Component}from "react"; import { Container, Row, ButtonGroup, Button, Col, Card, CardHeader, CardBody } from "shards-react"; import PageTitle from "../components/common/PageTitle"; import Rows from "./rows"; class Tables extends Component { state = { animaux:[ { id :"1",type:'vache',mode:'enceinte'}, { id :"2",type:'vache',mode:'enceinte'}] } delete =(index)=>{ const animaux =this.state.animaux; console.log(index); animaux.splice(index,1); this.setState({animaux}) } edit=(index,value1,value2)=>{ const animaux =this.state.animaux; let animal=animaux[index]; animal["type"]=value1; animal["mode"]=value2 //cour['type']=value; this.setState({ animaux }) } render (){ const animaux =this.state.animaux; let length = animaux.length; console.log(animaux); const animauxListe = length ?(animaux.map((valeur,index) =>{ return })):(
